title: Apple to rebrand iTunes Pass in Wallet app with iOS 15.5
content:
Apple has just released the first beta of iOS 15.5 to developers, and while we’re still looking for what’s new in today’s update, 9to5Mac has discovered something interesting based on the internal iOS files. Apple has been working to rebrand iTunes Pass as “Apple Account Card” in the Wallet app with iOS 15.5.

more…

The post Apple to rebrand iTunes Pass in Wallet app with iOS 15.5 appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: As analyzed by 9to5Mac, Apple has been working to rebrand iTunes Pass as "Apple Balance" in the Wallet app with iOS 15.5.
